mito -use json src.cel
! stderr .
cmp stdout want.txt

-- src.cel --
[
	{"a":1, "b":[1, 2, 3]}.encode_json(),
	encode_json({"a":1, "b":[1, 2, 3]}),
	({
		"a": {
			"b": {
				"c": 1
			}
		}
	}).encode_json(),
	encode_json({
		"a": {
			"b": {
				"c": 1
			}
		}
	}),
]
-- want.txt --
[
	"{\"a\":1,\"b\":[1,2,3]}",
	"{\"a\":1,\"b\":[1,2,3]}",
	"{\"a\":{\"b\":{\"c\":1}}}",
	"{\"a\":{\"b\":{\"c\":1}}}"
]
